@dev sets the MARKET_TKN contract address
 @param _address MARKET_TKN contract address

@dev sets the charity donation address
 @param _charityAddress charity erc20 address

@dev sets the default cost in PRüF of listing a non-PRüF NFT
 @param _price cost in PRüF(18) of listing a non-PRüF NFT

@dev Purchse an item from the consignment contract
 @param _tokenId consignment ID

@dev sets the MARKET_TKN contract address
 @param _address MARKET_TKN contract address

@dev sets the charity donation address
 @param _charityAddress charity erc20 address

@dev sets the default cost in PRüF of listing a non-PRüF NFT
 @param _price cost in PRüF(18) of listing a non-PRüF NFT

@dev Purchse an item from the consignment contract
 @param _tokenId consignment ID

consignPrufAsset(uint256,address,uint256.details: Wraps a pruf asset, takes original from caller (holds it in contract)

params._price: price in _currency to require for transfer

consignToken(uint256,address,address,uin.details: Wraps a token, takes original from caller (holds it in contract)

params._ERC721TokenContract: contract address for token to wrap
params._price: price in _currency to require for transfer
params.uri: string for URI Prerequisite: contract authorized for token txfr Takes original 721

purchaseItem(uint256).details: Purchse an item from the consignment contract

setListingPrice(uint32).details: sets the default cost in PRüF of listing a non-PRüF NFT

params._price: cost in PRüF(18) of listing a non-PRüF NFT

updateConsignment(uint256,address,uint25.details: Updates pricing information for an active consignment

params._price: price in _currency to require for transfer

withdrawFromConsignment(uint256).details: Unwraps a token, burns the MARKET_TKN, returns original to caller

params._tokenId: tokenID of consignment token being redeemed burns consignment token from caller wallet Sends original consigned 721 to caller
